Class GameService

java.lang.Object
main.java.com.team.game.service.GameService
public final class GameService extends Object
Provides a clean, high-level interface between the UI layer and the database layer.

The GameService acts as a facade around GameStore, handling user management, session tracking, score queries, and access to static question banks. Itâ€™s used by controllers throughout the app to keep UI logic separate from persistence and data concerns.
